00033 Aki::SqlNickname*
00034 SqlNickname::findNickname(const QString& nickname, const Aki::SqlServer* server)
00035 {
00036     QScopedPointer<Aki::SqlNickname> tmp(new Aki::SqlNickname);
00037     if (nickname.isEmpty() || nickname.isNull()) {
00038         return 0;
00039     }
00040 
00041     QSqlQuery query;
00042     query.prepare(QLatin1String("SELECT * FROM Nickname WHERE nickname=? AND nicknameServer=? LIMIT 1"));
00043     query.addBindValue(nickname);
00044     query.addBindValue(server->id());
00045 
00046     if (!query.exec()) {
00047         Aki::SqlNicknamePrivate::checkError(query.lastError());
00048         return 0;
00049     }
00050 
00051     if (query.size() == 0) {
00052         return 0;
00053     }
00054 
00055     QSqlRecord record = query.record();
00056     const int id = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("id"));
00057     const int nicknameIndex = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("nickname"));
00058     const int nicknameServer = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("nicknameServer"));
00059 
00060     while (query.next()) {
00061         tmp->setNickname(query.value(nicknameIndex).toString());
00062         tmp->setNicknameServerId(query.value(nicknameServer).toInt());
00063         tmp->setId(query.value(id).toInt());
00064         return tmp.take();
00065     }
00066 
00067     return 0;
00068 }

00076 Aki::SqlNickname*
00077 SqlNickname::newNickname(const QString& nickname, const Aki::SqlServer* server)
00078 {
00079     if (nickname.isEmpty() || nickname.isNull()) {
00080         return 0;
00081     }
00082 
00083     QSqlQuery query;
00084     query.prepare(QLatin1String("INSERT INTO Nickname (nickname,nicknameServer)"
00085                                 " VALUES(?,?)"));
00086 
00087     QScopedPointer<Aki::SqlNickname> tmp(new Aki::SqlNickname);
00088     tmp->setNickname(nickname);
00089     tmp->setNicknameServerId(server->id());
00090 
00091     query.addBindValue(tmp->nickname());
00092     query.addBindValue(tmp->nicknameServerId());
00093 
00094     if (!query.exec()) {
00095         Aki::SqlNicknamePrivate::checkError(query.lastError());
00096         return 0;
00097     }
00098 
00099     tmp->setId(query.lastInsertId().toInt());
00100     return tmp.take();
00101 }

00115 QList<Aki::SqlNickname*>
00116 SqlNickname::nicknamesForServer(const Aki::SqlServer* server)
00117 {
00118     QList<Aki::SqlNickname*> list;
00119     QSqlQuery query;
00120     query.prepare(QLatin1String("SELECT * FROM Server WHERE serverIdentity = ?"));
00121     query.addBindValue(server->id());
00122 
00123     if (!query.exec()) {
00124         Aki::SqlNicknamePrivate::checkError(query.lastError());
00125         return list;
00126     }
00127 
00128     if (query.size() == 0) {
00129         return list;
00130     }
00131 
00132     QSqlRecord record = query.record();
00133     const int id = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("id"));
00134     const int nicknameIndex = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("nickname"));
00135     const int nicknameServer = record.indexOf(QLatin1String("nicknameServer"));
00136 
00137     while (query.next()) {
00138         Aki::SqlNickname* nickname = new Aki::SqlNickname;
00139         nickname->setId(query.value(id).toInt());
00140         nickname->setNickname(query.value(nicknameIndex).toString());
00141         nickname->setNicknameServerId(query.value(nicknameServer).toInt());
00142         list.append(nickname);
00143     }
00144 
00145     return list;
00146 }

00166 bool
00167 SqlNickname::save()
00168 {
00169     QSqlQuery query;
00170     const QString str = QLatin1String("UPDATE Nickname SET nickname=?, nicknameServer=? WHERE id=?");
00171     query.prepare(str);
00172     query.addBindValue(nickname());
00173     query.addBindValue(nicknameServerId());
00174     query.addBindValue(id());
00175 
00176     if (!query.exec()) {
00177         Aki::SqlNicknamePrivate::checkError(query.lastError());
00178         return false;
00179     }
00180 
00181     return true;
00182 }

00184 bool
00185 SqlNickname::remove()
00186 {
00187     QSqlQuery query;
00188     const QString str = QLatin1String("DELETE FROM Nickname WHERE nickname=? AND id=?");
00189     query.prepare(str);
00190     query.addBindValue(nickname());
00191     query.addBindValue(nicknameServerId());
00192 
00193     if (!query.exec()) {
00194         Aki::SqlNicknamePrivate::checkError(query.lastError());
00195         return false;
00196     }
00197 
00198     return true;
00199 }
